info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 15 at 1:43PM MST until December 17 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s possible. * WHERE...Tonto Basin, San Carlos and Globe/Miami. * WHEN...From late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
